name: NEHotspotHelperCommand
desc: A command for the hotspot helper to handle.

items.name: var network: NEHotspotNetwork?
items.desc: The network associated with the command.

items.name: var networkList: [NEHotspotNetwork]?
items.desc: The list of networks associated with the command.

items.name: func bind(to: NEHotspotHelperCommand)
items.desc: Binds a URL request to the network interface associated with the hotspot helper command instance.

items.name: func createTCPConnection(NWEndpoint) -> NWTCPConnection
items.desc: Create a new TCP connection over the network associated with the command.

items.name: func createUDPSession(NWEndpoint) -> NWUDPSession
items.desc: Create a new UDP session over the network associated with the command.

items.name: func createResponse(NEHotspotHelperResult) -> NEHotspotHelperResponse
items.desc: Create a response to the command.
